short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove cache, cookies, storage, and others

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Data quick cleaner is a simple chrome extension for remove page or browsing data.

This extension is created for my own necessities. If you have some bugs or you need other utilities please contact me.

Some of the usabilities are:
- remove page cache
- remove page cookies
- remove page local storage
- remove browser apps cache
- remove all browsing cache
- remove browsing cache storage
- remove browsing downloads
- remove browsing file system data
- remove browsing forms data
- remove browsing history
- remove browsing indexedDB
- remove all browsing local storage
- remove all passwords
- remove services workers
- remove all browsing web SQL

⚠️ Important:
- Removing browsing data involves a good deal of heavy lifting in the background, and can take tens of seconds to complete, depending on a user's profile.

- This extension use "chrome.browsingData.removeCookie" thats means, if the user is syncing their data, when clear the cookie for the Sync account, and Sync will be paused.

The icons used in the extension are from "Feather Icons" (https://feathericons.com/).
